name: filesize
description: JavaScript library to generate a human readable String describing the file size
author: Jason Mulligan <jason.mulligan@avoidwork.com>

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.test-webpack: mkdir -p test/webpack && rm -rf test/webpack/* && git clone git@github.com:rabelais88/typescript-webpack.git test/webpack && echo "import { filesize } from 'filesize';console.log(filesize(1234));" >> test/webpack/src/index.ts && cd test/webpack && npm install && mkdir -p node_modules/filesize/dist && cp ../../package.json node_modules/filesize/ && cp ../../dist/* node_modules/filesize/dist/ && npm run build
